Import data
```{r}
library(readr)
train_data <- read_csv("./Data/train.csv")
test_data <- read_csv("./Data/test.csv")
```

Basic summary and plot
```{r}
summary(train_data)
boxplot(x = subset(train_data, select = -c(id, target)), las=2)
summary(test_data)
boxplot(x = subset(test_data, select = -c(id)))
```

PCA analysis
```{r}
train_pca <- prcomp(subset(train_data, select = -c(id, target)), center = TRUE, scale = TRUE) 
summary(train_pca)
plot(train_pca)
biplot(train_pca,choices=c(1,2),cex=0.5, main = "Train data biplot")


train_pca <- prcomp(subset(train_data, select = -c(id, target)), center = TRUE, scale = TRUE) 
summary(train_pca)
plot(train_pca)
biplot(train_pca,choices=c(1,2),cex=0.5, main = "Train data biplot")
```

Correlation between individuals
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library("gplots")
heatmap.2(as.matrix(subset(train_data, select = -c(id, target))), scale="column")
```

Logistic model for variable selection
```{r}
model <- lm(target ~ .,data = train_data, select = -c(id))))
summary(model)
```


Feature selection with Boruta
```{r}
library(Boruta)
important <- Boruta(revenue~., data=subset(train_data, select = !(names(train_data) %in% c("Id", "City"))),  doTrace = 2, ntree = 300)
names(train_data[, c(important$finalDecision != "Rejected", T)])
plot(important)
plotZHistory(important)
important_fix <- TentativeRoughFix(important)
print(important_fix)
```
